name: moss as texture as space folding onto itself
name_original: moss as texture as space folding onto itself
description:
peat moss, noise, space, bodies

an entry to the moss-themed #bitsyjam
using bitsy by Adam Le Doux and the bitsy audio tool by mark wonnacott

music: Pass the Time, from Nicolas Jaar's Pomegranates
(originally released as a free download, tracks still available for free on the above discography link and paid full album through Other People Records' store)
